hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray on his mount while on a journey, no matter what direction it was facing." Malik said: "Abdullah bin Dinar said: 'And Ibn 'Umar used to do likewise

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَالِ الَّتِي يَجُوزُ فِيهَا اسْتِقْبَالُ غَيْرِ الْقِبْلَةِ .
chapter.eng-name: Situations In Which It Is Permitted Not To Face The Qiblah
